about_the_game:
Who said ink war is reserved to squids and octopus?! In Hoshimago, change the world's color with or against your friends.

Hoshimago is a multiplayer versus game; two teams of 5 players compete in a painting war: the first one must cover the ground with paint while the other must clean it ~
Rush for bonuses, help your teammates; lead your team to victory!

Rules are simple, when a Hoshimago moves, it lets paint behind him. Anywhere you go, you paint the field; the more you move, the more you paint!
But be careful, you are not alone! SNails want the cleanest terrain before the timer ends.. And they got weapons!
SNails can shoot water with their powerful hydro pump, and Hoshimagos don't like it... at all! They will not only clean up the trail of paint that you have left, but if you get hit... it's K.O!..

Clean all the floor, or mess it up in Hoshimago!
